name: Name

hero.name: KARIM ALDEEN
hero.description: I am a full stack developer with 3.5 years of experience in React.js and TypeScript, and 1 year of experience in Laravel. I specialize in creating dynamic, responsive web applications and have a solid understanding of both front-end and back-end technologies

aboutUs.educationDescription: After three years at my first university, I had to take a year off due to illness. Following my recovery, I chose to begin anew at a different university. Excited for a fresh start, I'm optimistic about the opportunities this change brings to my academic journey.

1.title: Syrian Virtual University
1.content: Embarked on the journey of studying Bachelor in Communications Technology (BACT) / BCF: at the Syrian Virtual University. The first year curriculum provided a foundational understanding of various aspects of IT.

2.title: Meta Course Advanced React
2.content: Completed the Advanced React course offered by Meta, gaining proficiency in building sophisticated React applications and mastering advanced concepts.

3.title: Meta Course Front-End Development
3.content: Engaged in the Front-End Development course provided by Meta, acquiring skills in creating responsive and visually appealing user interfaces using modern front-end technologies.

lookingFor.title: Looking For Job As FULL STACK Developer
lookingFor.content: Passionate about creating seamless user experiences, I specialize in React.js development. I am eager to contribute my skills and expertise to a dynamic company that values innovation and cutting-edge technologies.
lookingFor.buttonText: Take a Look at My CV

skill.label: What is your best skill?
skill.content: My strongest skill is in React development. I have a solid foundation in React, extending to Next.js for server-side rendering, Redux for state management, and various UI frameworks like Boostrap, Ant Design (antd), and Material-UI (mui). Additionally, I'm proficient in using additional tools such as Formik for form management, react-query for data fetching, and Zustand for state management. My expertise extends to working with TypeScript for type safety in large-scale projects. Furthermore, I have experience in integrating socket communication for real-time features. On the design side, I am adept at using Photoshop, Illustrator, and Adobe XD to bring design concepts to life. I also follow design patterns, particularly the SOLID principles, to ensure scalable and maintainable code

careerBackground.label: Can you provide an overview of your career background as a Front-End Developer
careerBackground.content: Work As FronEnd Developer With Over three Year and half of Experience, self motivated, ambitious and hard Worker Hoping to Make my interpersonal Skill to Achieve Goals of Company

educationalBackground.label: What is your educational background?
educationalBackground.content: Education: Information Technology (BAIT) at Syrian Virtual University, Training / Courses: 1.Meta Advanced React, 2. Meta Front-End Developer Professional

remoteWork.label: Are you open to remote work
remoteWork.content: Yes, I am open to remote work, and I also have experience working freelance

projects.label: Can you share details about some of the projects you worked on as a Front-End Developer?
content: Developed a comprehensive Full Dashboard comprising over 40 pages for an E-commerce system.
Implemented advanced user interface pages for efficient data display and editing.
Created a Vendor Dashboard for streamlined vendor management.
Designed and built a Landing Page with complex animations to enhance user engagement.
Successfully deployed the project to GitLab and a Linux server.
Built a Website, E-commerce platform, and Dashboard for a software company.
Developed a Website and Dashboard for an oil company.
Worked on the development of a mid-scale E-commerce platform using ReactJS.
Completed the design and creation of over 5 logos.
Crafted three Personal Portfolios showcasing diverse skills and projects.
Constructed a Dashboard for a large Delivery App.
Developed three websites, including a Landing Page and Customer Interface.
Successfully deployed the project to cPanel for seamless accessibility.
